html:
1.10.18  4:02 pm   If you could have dinner with any 10 people, who would it be?

     the people who made the dinner

1.10.18  3:41 pm   You said you wish to make content of a more medium length; the history of the world video took way too long, you've said. But dang man, it's been nearly a third of that just to make this medium-length video. At least the history of the world got 37 million views. Are you certain it's not worth it to increase the audience rate even if the video takes longer? I just wonder why you decide that medium-length videos are fine to pursue, when they also take forever, but will probably get much fewer views, compared to the video that takes 11 months, but gets a ton of people watching it. 

     ah, that's the kind of confidence we need on our team. would you be available for an interview

1.10.18  3:07 pm   im sure you get asked this a lot and its probably annoying but i dont really want to look so how is the new video coming along

sorry for bothering you

     good

1.10.18  1:04 pm   tell me an anti-poem 

     how about this

1.10.18  12:51 pm   I'm going to a concert this weekend at a 'music hall', like a theater with assigned seating and stuff. Am I supposed to dress nice?  

     you are supposed to dress the way everyone else dresses, which unfortunately you will not know until after you get there

1.10.18  12:38 pm   Why is the harmonic minor scale called 'harmonic' and the melodic minor is called 'melodic'? 

     if i had to guess, i would say it's because the harmonic minor scale (that means you use natural 7 but flat 6) seems to be what you get as a result of using (let's say it's the key of C minor) the G7 chord. you need that B natural note to make the G7 tick, and you might as well keep the Ab around (i.e. G7b9 or whatever). but sometimes melodies want to go 5,6,7,8 (so la ti do) kind of like that disney movie with the brooms dancing or whatever. so that would be the melodic minor scale. that one is usually only used on the way up

1.10.18  12:13 pm   Has your illuminati paperwork gone through yet? 

     i can't tell you

1.10.18  11:50 am   did u sneak a fuck in we could just get high & california to have the songs listed as explicit because the songs are about drugs or is that just a coincidence

     it's a coincidence. i used the word 'fuck' in both of those songs because it made sense for the song at the time. i regret that the stores make such a big deal about certain words, and the interesting thing is i'm sure no one would have noticed it but i didn't want to get arrested for it

1.10.18  11:49 am   why are you following an account called Banana Gecko on twitter

     why would i not be

1.10.18  11:39 am   Ight so pick a number between 1 and infinity 

     ok

1.10.18  11:37 am   if life gave you lemons would you make orange juice?

     no

1.10.18  11:37 am   What's the best movie line in all of history?

     i have not seen all the movies. there is also no way to determine exactly how 'good' a line is

1.10.18  11:29 am   What you think about modern pop music?

     seems legit

1.10.18  10:57 am   Every time I try to write a song, I can't. I might have an idea, but I can never actually write it down.

So, please, can you explain how to write songs.

     what is the idea? is there any possible way you could exlain it, in any way, to anyone? if so, go ahead and record yourself giving that explanation, and then document the name of the thing and what date you came up with it, and where the explanation recording can be found

1.10.18  10:13 am   how come dinosaurs? what for?

     to see how big you can get

1.10.18  9:00 am   Would you rather be dumb and happy or smart and sad?

     i don't think it's possible to not be a combination of all of those things

1.10.18  8:06 am   wheres my mixtape

     where did you last have it

1.10.18  5:24 am   can this question appear under your answer to it?

     i'll see what i can do

1.10.18  2:13 am   do you feel like the question topics come in waves sometimes? like a bunch of questions of the same topic all in a short span of time?

     yes

1.10.18  1:22 am   what genre is your music in so i can describe it to people when i blast it in school

     why would you need to describe it if you are playing it out loud

1.9.18  9:46 pm   You should update  your notebook.

     i am regularly updating twitter, questions, anagrams, and instagram, and also working on a video every day. that will have to be enough. if you prefer i can delete the sections that are not being updated, so you don't have to look at them

1.9.18  9:15 pm   I think you spelled questions wrong

     i think you failed to take the color scheme into account

1.9.18  9:09 pm   Are smart people less likely to experience failure?

     than what

1.9.18  6:52 pm   Your favorite snack? 

     lunch

1.9.18  5:38 pm   What kind of lizard are you? 

     non

1.9.18  5:32 pm   Ahhhh big! why is everything big AND small at the same time!??!! fuckin sub-molecular in size and also huge beyond humanly fathomable proportions. what?!??!?!

     just to have some variety

1.9.18  5:13 pm   Do you do voodoo?

     not on purpose

1.9.18  4:43 pm   How do I save the world?

     be yourself

1.9.18  3:49 pm   In 1930's big band music, why was it seemingly customary to have one part of the song be the catchy hook, and another part of the song to be chromatic nonsense?

     i can't think of any examples of what you are talking about

1.9.18  3:48 pm   What mouthpiece would you recommend for a person who's been playing for a few years but isn't an expert?

     what instrument

1.9.18  3:43 pm   Life quote?

     "hi"

1.9.18  12:22 pm   Are ghosts good hosts?

     that would vary from ghost to ghost

1.9.18  11:36 am   what do you live for?

      possibilities, opportunities, etc

1.9.18  11:15 am   Is it possible to make a universe out of love

     that might be the only way to make a universe

1.9.18  8:53 am   Make me happy 

     i will try

1.9.18  7:58 am   Are you ever in public and a great idea hits and there's absolutely no way you can pull out your phone to record it and then you can't remember it later and you slowly die a ridiculous number of times?

     not anymore. now i know better

     Have you learned some next-level ninja method around this that you would please share?

     yes. i share it quite frequently, in fact i feel someone just asked me about it within the last couple days here true

1.9.18  12:17 am   Why didn't anybody tell the beatles that there are only 7 days a week?

     why didn't anyone ever tell you that songwriting is a place for "fun" and "creativity"

1.8.18  11:30 pm   sometimes I think of something really interesting or funny, and then just forget it immidiatly. and then I try and strain my brain to get it back but never can. and then Ill stop thinking of anything interesting or funny because I'm too busy trying to remember. how can I prevent this cycle of bullshitiry?

     write it down?

1.8.18  11:05 pm   where can i go to learn how to be a normally functioning human person

     earth?

1.8.18  10:59 pm   Do you have strong feelings about goblins?

     no

1.8.18  10:37 pm   do you know any street lingo?

     STOP. Left lane MUST turn left. Speed Limit 40

1.8.18  10:35 pm   just had this realization that i never interact with anything in real time anymore. just alot of thinking. and it's like........................................................................................................................................................... i could do more of that or. or. or. i could think some more? more thinking..............................................................................................but WAIT! WAIT!.... eventually, you have to MAKE SOMETHING REAL...... or it's all in your head, yeah? and so so so so so so so so I have to BE places and TOUCH things and REACT. responding. STIMULUS. STIM. U. LUS. I NEED STIMULUS. like.... MUSIC! MUSIC! it's all about TIMING and other things... but TIMING. do the thing at the right time! right TiMe. time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time time TALKING TALKING TO PEOPLE IS ALSO LIKE THIS HELLO HI YES HOW ARE YOU HOLD UP I CAN'T REACH YOU

and then the internet(!). of COURSE i like interacting on   the internet. it's like how i like it, slow motion, think about EVERYTHING for A VERY LONG TIME. uaahahahasd;flk. but, and listen. just listen. WII SPORTS BASKETBALL AIR HOCKEY VIDEO GAMES DUDUUDDUUDUDUUDUDUDDUDUDUDUDUDUUDUDUUDUD

     ah, it sounds like you are on the right track

1.8.18  10:30 pm   Am i the only one who likes the song all-star in a non-ironic way? I like the lyrics a lot, and I like those reggae guitar chops in the verses, and I like that slinky little high-pitched instrumental bridge melody that plays after the chorus. 

     it's a great song. i think they made it great on purpose

1.8.18  10:10 pm   So paul said that pop music is the classical music of now.. but quincy jones said that jazz is the classical music of pop. Now I am confused. If pop is the classical music of now and jazz is the classical music of pop... then, jazz is the classical music of classical music? My head hurts. 

     i think music is the most effective when you listen to it, rather than listening to people talk about it

1.8.18  10:07 pm   how do you refrain from mentally snapping during college

      i have no idea

1.8.18  10:04 pm   If you hate the word  "towel" does it hate you back?

     i doubt it

1.8.18  10:04 pm   how important is it to abide by social norms

     ah, that would be a question to ask society

1.8.18  9:42 pm   have you ever tried to write a screenplay?

     i write all my own screenplays

1.8.18  9:37 pm   Did you get those subscriber plaques yet?

     no

     it's figuring stuff out
